top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body: Barista….Mrs Potts…like the teapot on Beauty & The Beast. 🫖
Your house is so beautiful and congratulations on 13 Milion subscribers xoxo 😘

Wow...your new house is HUGE!!! Almost as big as the mansion I just visited. 
I hope that you and your family is enjoying the new place! Happy Holidays, Ro and Mike. ^_^
If you don't mind can I stay over for a night????🤣🤣🤣
you've come so far Ro SUPER PROUD to be a part of this beautiful family
Chandelier In modern house is unique
You should call your barista "Brew"! That sounds cute for a coffee maker 😁
U should name the house barista, Starbies!
I want to see pewdiepie critique this lol beautiful home by the way ♥️
Omg it felt like yesterday when I watched her previous house tour
"Room to grow". I mean.. I dont even have to say what we are all thinking lol
Plz a fridge and pantry tour😘

All the tours please!!! Closet, kitchen, fridge, backyard, bathroom, EVERYTHING 😅 And organisational videos too. I love interior design and organising, so would love seeing those types of videos from you Ro 🥰 Congratulations on your new beautiful home 🥳
